publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1851 Jackie Baillie: Children’s Hospice Association Scotland—That the Parliament notes that Children’s Hospice Awareness Week ran from 18 to 26 September 2004; further notes that the Children’s Hospice Association Scotland (CHAS) runs Rachel House Children’s Hospice in Kinross and is due to open Robin House Children’s Hospice in Balloch in March 2005; recognises that Robin House will be a welcome addition to parents and children in the west of Scotland; commends the commitment of CHAS staff, volunteers and supporters and the patience and understanding of the parents involved; notes also that CHAS is developing a free "at home" service which will reach out to all communities across Scotland, and congratulates everyone who was involved in the Children’s Hospice International 16th World Congress which took place in Edinburgh from 26 to 29 September 2004.
S2M-1851 Children’s Hospice Association Scotland (lodged on 12 October 2004) Robert Brown*, Murray Tosh*

S2M-1851 Children’s Hospice Association Scotland (lodged on 12 October 2004) Tricia Marwick*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Murdo Fraser*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr John Swinney*, Mike Pringle*, Bruce Crawford*, Frances Curran*, Bill Aitken*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Elaine Smith*, Pauline McNeill*, Michael McMahon*, Ms Sandra White*, John Swinburne*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr Mark Ruskell*

S2M-1851 Children’s Hospice Association Scotland (lodged on 12 October 2004) Margaret Jamieson*, Sarah Boyack*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Helen Eadie*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Chris Ballance*, Margaret Mitchell*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-1851 Children’s Hospice Association Scotland (lodged on 12 October 2004) Alex Neil*

S2M-1851 Children’s Hospice Association Scotland (lodged on 12 October 2004) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Tommy Sheridan*, Trish Godman*, Scott Barrie*, Cathie Craigie*, Janis Hughes*, Maureen Macmillan*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1851 Children’s Hospice Association Scotland (lodged on 12 October 2004) Rosie Kane*, Dr Jean Turner*, Karen Whitefield*
S2M-1851 Children’s Hospice Association Scotland (lodged on 12 October 2004) Robin Harper*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-1851 Children’s Hospice Association Scotland (lodged on 12 October 2004) Cathy Peattie*
